info.title: LangConnect API
info.description: A REST API for a RAG system using FastAPI and LangChain

get.description: Lists all available PGVector collections (name and UUID).

post.description: Creates a new PGVector collection by name with optional metadata.

get.description: Retrieves details (name and UUID) of a specific PGVector collection.

delete.description: Deletes a specific PGVector collection by name.

patch.description: Updates a specific PGVector collection's name and/or metadata.

get.description: Unified search across all documents and crawled pages for the user.
Unified search across all documents and crawled pages within a specific collection.

post.description: Processes and indexes (adds) new document files with optional metadata.

schema.title: Response Documents Create Collections  Collection Id  Documents Post

get.description: Lists documents within a specific collection.

schema.title: Response Documents List Collections  Collection Id  Documents Get

post.description:
Step 1: Upload a document to storage and create a record in the database.
Does not perform chunking or embedding yet.

schema.title: Response Documents Upload Collections  Collection Id  Upload Post

post.description: Step 2: Process (chunk and embed) a previously uploaded document.

schema.title: Response Documents Process Collections  Collection Id  Documents  Document Id  Process Post

post.description: Step 3: Perform embedding for a document that has already been chunked.

schema.title: Response Documents Embed Collections  Collection Id  Documents  Document Id  Embed Post

get.description: Retrieves all chunks for a specific file (file_id) within a collection.

schema.title: Response Documents Get Chunks Collections  Collection Id  Documents  File Id  Chunks Get

delete.description: Deletes a specific document from a collection by its ID.

schema.title: Response Documents Delete Collections  Collection Id  Documents  Document Id  Delete

post.description: Search for documents within a specific collection.

schema.title: Response Documents Search Collections  Collection Id  Documents Search Post

post.description:
Advanced processing using PaddleOCR VLM. 
Best for documents where layout and high-quality OCR are critical.

schema.title: Response Documents Create Paddle Collections  Collection Id  Documents Paddle Post

post.description:
Experimental processing using IBM Granite Docling (Ollama).
This model is specifically trained for high-fidelity document understanding.

schema.title: Response Documents Create Granite Collections  Collection Id  Documents Granite Post

post.description: Search for documents across all collections.

schema.title: Response Documents Search Global Documents Search Post

post.description:
Directly converts a document to markdown using Docling.
Does not save to any collection.

schema.title: Response Documents Get Markdown Documents Markdown Post

post.description:
Directly converts a document to markdown using Granite Docling.
Does not save to any collection or perform embedding.

parameters.name: max_pages

schema.description: Maximum number of pages to process
schema.title: Max Pages

parameters.description: Maximum number of pages to process

schema.title: Response Documents Get Markdown Granite Documents Markdown Granite Post

post.description:
Starts an asynchronous document conversion and chunking task.
Supports all docling-serve settings via options_json.

schema.title: Response Documents Start Async Chunk Documents Async Chunk Post

get.description: Polls the status of an asynchronous docling task.

schema.title: Response Documents Get Task Status Documents Tasks  Task Id  Get

get.description: Retrieves the result of a completed docling task.

schema.title: Response Documents Get Task Result Documents Tasks  Task Id  Result Get

post.description: Clears completed docling task results from the server.

parameters.name: older_than

schema.description: Clear results older than this many seconds
schema.title: Older Than

parameters.description: Clear results older than this many seconds

schema.title: Response Documents Clear Tasks Documents Tasks Clear Post

post.description: Clears cached document converters from the docling-serve memory.

schema.title: Response Documents Clear Converters Documents Converters Clear Post

get.description:
Get lightweight summaries of knowledge items (files) across all collections.
Optimized for card displays and rapid polling in the frontend.
Get global statistics for the user knowledge base.

post.description: Register a new Ollama instance for the user.

get.description: List all registered Ollama instances.

schema.title: Response List Ollama Instances Api Ollama Instances Get

get.description: Retrieve all models from all registered Ollama instances.

post.description: Set the active embedding model and its Ollama instance.

get.description: Get the currently selected embedding model and instance URL.
Check the health of all registered Ollama instances.

post.description:
Start a new background crawling task for a specific collection.

Returns a task_id that can be used to poll progress.

schema.title: Response Start Crawl Collections  Collection Id  Crawl Post

get.description: List all crawl tasks for a specific collection.

schema.title: Response List Collection Crawls Collections  Collection Id  Crawls Get

delete.description: Delete all crawl task records for a specific collection.

schema.title: Response Delete Collection Crawls Collections  Collection Id  Crawls Delete

get.description: List all active crawl tasks.

schema.title: Response List Active Crawls Crawl Active Get

get.description: Get the status of a specific crawl task.

schema.title: Response Get Crawl Status Crawl  Task Id  Get

delete.description: Delete a crawl task record from history.

schema.title: Response Delete Crawl Crawl  Task Id  Delete

post.description: Cancel a running crawl task.

schema.title: Response Cancel Crawl Crawl  Task Id  Cancel Post

get.description: Retrieve current crawl settings for the user.

schema.title: Response Get Crawl Settings Crawl Settings Get

post.description: Update crawl settings for the user.

schema.title: Response Update Crawl Settings Crawl Settings Post

get.description: List all crawled pages for a specific collection.

schema.title: Response List Collection Pages Collections  Collection Id  Pages Get

delete.description: Delete all crawled pages associated with a specific collection.

schema.title: Response Delete Collection Pages Collections  Collection Id  Pages Delete

get.description: Get the full content and metadata of a specific crawled page.

schema.title: Response Get Page Content Pages  Page Id  Get

delete.description: Delete a specific crawled page and its associated data.

schema.title: Response Delete Page Pages  Page Id  Delete

delete.description: Delete a crawl source and all its associated pages, chunks, and code examples.

schema.title: Response Delete Source Sources  Source Id  Delete

get.description:
List files and folders in Supabase Storage.
Defaults to the user's root folder if no path is provided.

parameters.name: path

schema.description: Path within the bucket to browse (usually the user folder)
schema.title: Path

parameters.description: Path within the bucket to browse (usually the user folder)

get.description: Download a file from Supabase Storage.

parameters.name: path

schema.description: Full path to the file in Supabase Storage
schema.title: Path

parameters.description: Full path to the file in Supabase Storage

delete.description: Delete a file from Supabase Storage.

parameters.name: path

schema.description: Full path to the file in Supabase Storage to delete
schema.title: Path

parameters.description: Full path to the file in Supabase Storage to delete

get.description: List all settings for the current user.

post.description: Create or update a user setting.

get.description: Get a specific setting for the current user.

post.description: Create or update the user's profile and persona.

get.description: Retrieve the current user's profile and generated system prompt.
Retrieve all user profiles (Admin only).
Retrieve basic profile info for all users to visualize hierarchy.

post.description: Update any user profile (Admin only).
Delete a user profile and all associated data (Admin only).

get.description: List all dynamic personas in the database.

post.description: Create or update a persona configuration.

get.description: Health check endpoint.

name.title: Name
name.description: The unique name of the collection.

CollectionCreate.title: CollectionCreate
CollectionCreate.description: Schema for creating a new collection.

uuid.title: Uuid
uuid.description: The unique identifier of the collection in PGVector.

CollectionResponse.title: CollectionResponse
CollectionResponse.description: Schema for representing a collection from PGVector.

CollectionUpdate.title: CollectionUpdate
CollectionUpdate.description: Schema for updating an existing collection.

CrawlRequest.title: CrawlRequest
CrawlRequest.description: Request model for starting a crawl operation.

url.title: Url
url.description: The base URL of the Ollama instance (e.g., http://localhost:11434)

name.title: Name
name.description: Optional friendly name for the instance
